channel.title: 317 Cache Repacker
channel.description:
About a year ago, there was a program kicking about that allowed you to unpack and repack the 317 cache. Is it still out there? I can't seem to find it.
Also, what's the tidiest way to steal models from the 'new' Runscape cache and repack them into the 317 cache so that they can be used. Preferably, I'd like them in the cache, rather than strewn about the client files, but I can settle for that if I have to.
Many thanks,
Syrillia

item.title: 317 Cache Repacker
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Wicked, just what I was after, thanks guys. I couldn’t remember what it was called Try finding a program when you don’t know it’s name

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Cache Repacker
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

http://uppit.com/v/GVBQ3AAR

would be it.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Cache Repacker

Toms cache suite possibly?

item.title: 317 Cache Repacker
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

No, not winrar. The program specifically opened the cache files and allowed you to edit them by importing and exporting models/changing the texture graphics, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Cache Repacker
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I don’t know about the model part (you might want to post that in client help) but the packaging program is winRAR

Read full topic
